title: Venezuela Baseball League Seeks Way Around U.S. Sanctions on Maduro Regime
text:
Venezuela’s baseball league says it has cut all sponsorship ties to its country’s government institutions blacklisted by the U.S. in an attempt to find a way around sanctions that prompted Major League Baseball to ban its players from winter ball in the South American country.

The eight teams that make up the Venezuelan Professional Baseball League, or LVBP, agreed in a private meeting on Sept. 17 to sever all financial relations with Venezuela’s central government, according to a league resolution that hasn’t been made public...
description: Venezuela’s baseball league is looking for a way around sanctions that prompted Major League Baseball to ban its players from winter ball in the South American country.
